hero.title: My Story
hero.subtitle: From personal challenges to global solutions - the journey that led to transforming international mobility for thousands.

intro.title: The Journey Begins
intro.paragraph_1: My journey into international mobility began with my own challenges as an expat. Moving between countries, I experienced firsthand the complexities, frustrations, and gaps in support that millions of expats face daily.
intro.paragraph_2: These personal experiences became the foundation for understanding what expats truly need - not just information, but comprehensive support, reliable networks, and innovative solutions that actually work.
intro.paragraph_3: Today, through SOS-Expat and Ulixai, I've transformed these insights into platforms that have helped over 500,000 expats navigate their international journeys successfully.

hero.title: Media & Press

bio.short_content: Williams Jullin is a global mobility expert and entrepreneur who has transformed international relocation through innovative platforms SOS-Expat and Ulixai, serving over 500,000 expats worldwide.
bio.long_paragraph_1: Williams Jullin is a pioneering figure in global mobility, having transformed the international relocation landscape through innovative technology and comprehensive support networks.
bio.long_paragraph_2: As the founder of SOS-Expat and Ulixai, Williams has created an ecosystem that addresses every aspect of the expat journey, from emergency assistance to comprehensive relocation planning.
bio.long_paragraph_3: His platforms have successfully supported over 500,000 expats across 25+ countries, establishing him as a leading authority in international mobility and expat services.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.point_1: 500M+ people live outside their birth country with inadequate support
problem.point_2: Fragmented services create inefficiencies and poor experiences
problem.point_3: Emergency situations leave expats vulnerable without proper assistance
